    • Method Detail

      • processKeyEvent

        public void processKeyEvent(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Process a key event for movements or the escape button. It then draws out the map and the inventory contents. It also calls the method so that all enemies move.
        Parameters:
        event - The key that was pressed.

      • drawGame

        public void drawGame()
        Draw the game on the canvas.

        Create the GUI.
        Returns:
        The panel holding the GUI
